channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (25 Apr 2017)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 25 Apr 2017.

item.title: 1 IDR = 0.045231 XAF
